title: How to Sing on Rock Band 2 (for Beginners)

steps.headline: Purchase Rock Band 2 (either the whole pack or just the game).
steps.description: If you already have the game, skip this step.

steps.headline: Get the microphone.
steps.description: You need it. You can also use the Xbox headset, but it won't work as well. Preferably, you should use the microphone.

steps.headline: Create your character, or if you already have one, skip this step as well.
steps.description: If you just bought the game, you need a character in order to get started, unless you want to play on quick play.

steps.headline: Select a song.
steps.description: Make sure you partially know the song, though. You don't want to sing "Eye of the Tiger" if you don't know any of the words.

steps.headline: Sing!
steps.description: Make sure to keep your voice on the right note. There's a small arrow to the side telling you your pitch compared to the song's pitch (represented by the line). Try to line up the arrow with the line and sing the same notes as the singer.

steps.headline: Enjoy yourself!
steps.description: If you aren't having fun there's no point to playing the video game.

text: Purchase Rock Band 2 (either the whole pack or just the game). If you already have the game, skip this step. Get the microphone. You need it. You can also use the Xbox headset, but it won't work as well. Preferably, you should use the microphone. Create your character, or if you already have one, skip this step as well. If you just bought the game, you need a character in order to get started, unless you want to play on quick play. Select a song. Make sure you partially know the song, though. You don't want to sing "Eye of the Tiger" if you don't know any of the words. Sing! Make sure to keep your voice on the right note. There's a small arrow to the side telling you your pitch compared to the song's pitch (represented by the line). Try to line up the arrow with the line and sing the same notes as the singer. Enjoy yourself! If you aren't having fun there's no point to playing the video game.
